page.title: 15NEWSPAPER
page.content: The Braunstone Town Journal is the local newspaper for Braunstone. It replaced 'THE LIFE' and 'BY-LINE'. It is being organised in temporary premises but the owners are in the process of negotiating the lease of premises from which both the paper and a new magazine will be produced. The magazine will be claeed 'OPEN DOOR'. The first issue will come out in June 1985. The newspaper is circulated amongst local residents and contains local news items and articles which affect the daily lives of local people. In addition to news items, there are reports of social events, sports fixtures, advertisements from local shops and industries.
